‮‪2

In the name of God, the Compassionate, t[he Merciful].
May God prolong your life and may He cau[se] your might
and honour to continue, and complete His favour towards you and increase
His benefits unto you.
Charge my account to the credit of Abû Qîr b. Ṭauros
with one dînâr miṯqâlî,
and to the credit of Bqâm b. Merqûre with two dînârs
... Mache den beiden gegenüber (bei der Auszahlung des Geldes) keine Ausflüchte! miṯqâlî, do not put them to his debit,
if God wills.
Der Gruß sei wie der Beginn (des Briefes). Der Segenswunsch sei wie der (am) Briefanfang! The salutation is like the perseverance.
Praise be to God (and) thanks be to God. Preis sei Gott als Dank an Ihn!
...] ... from ʿUmrān b. ʿĪsā
... the blacksmith
